title: Home - WK Kellogg Co®
text: At WK Kellogg Co, we bring our best to everyone, every day through our trusted foods and brands. Our journey began in 1894, when our founder W.K. Kellogg reimagined the future of food with the creation of Corn Flakes, changing breakfast forever. Since then, we have embraced the same spirit of innovation and entrepreneurship in everything we do, channeling our founder’s passion and commitment to creating high quality and delicious products while fostering communities. Many of our cereals provide 5g* or more protein from grains alone! - *4% Daily Value The grains and bran in many cereals naturally provide fiber, which most of us do not get enough of.* - *What We Eat in America, NHANES 2009-2010 OUR STORY It started with cereal Wondering how we got here? From the beginning with the creation of Corn Flakes, to supporting our communities and finally, us now—here’s the story. OUR IMPACT Helping people be healthier, happier, together At WK Kellogg Co, we believe that doing good is always good for business. And we have stood for this since Kellogg Company was founded more than 117 years ago. We are passionate about doing our part to make nutritious foods, create social connectivity and respect natural resources. Together, these actions create positive progress for people and the planet – today and for years to come. Join our team Searching for a workplace dedicated to your success? Check out our latest job openings.
